contained.name: FollowupSurPass
contained.description:
Follow up form.
The first Followup-Surpass-Surpass form must be completed at the same time as the SurPass is delivered or in any case at the first visit after the end of the treatment (OT).

item.text: Informed consent to participate in the Followup-Surpass
Predisposing genetic syndromes or clinical conditions associated with the tumor diagnosed after the first off-therapy
Other clinical pictures, not associated with the tumor at the time of diagnosis
After the first off therapy the patient experienced one or more pathological conditions

initial.valueString: This space will contain guidance for the selected condition. Content is not yet available.

item.text: Have any pathological conditions that were still present (unresolved) at the previous visit resolved or changed in degree?

initial.valueString: This space will contain guidance for the selected condition. Content is not yet available.

item.text: After the first off therapy the patient experienced one or more pathological conditions?

initial.valueString: This space will contain guidance for the selected condition. Content is not yet available.

item.text: Reports relating to significant laboratory instrumental tests
